basics.name: Tran Phuong Nam
basics.label: Scientist
basics.summary: An artificial intelligence researcher with a strong background in mathematics and computer science. I am interested in the application of machine learning and deep learning in computer vision, natural language processing, and reinforcement learning.

location.address: D1 Street Saigon Hi-tech Park, Long Thanh My Ward, District 9

work.name: K&G Technology, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
work.summary: Implementing machine learning and deep learning algorithms to solve real-world problems.

work.name: Pythera AI, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
work.summary: Researching and developing machine learning and deep learning algorithms related to computer vision and natural language processing.

education.institution: FPT University, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

awards.title: Best Paper Award
awards.summary: RBBA: ResNet-BERT-Bahdanau Attention for Image Caption Generator Received Best Paper Award at the 14th International Conference on ICT Convergence - ICTC 2023

awards.title: Valedictorian of information technology
awards.summary: Being awarded the valedictorian of Information Technology at FPT University's Graduation Ceremony fills me with an overwhelming sense of pride and accomplishment.
